entry.string: The Themes Module controls the display of your website. Certain display variables are set from this module to allow you to control the site name, footer information, etc.
entry.translation: Zee Zeemes Mudoole-a cuntruls zee deespley ooff yuoor vebseete-a. Certeeen deespley fereeebles ere-a set frum thees mudoole-a tu elloo yuoo tu cuntrul zee seete-a neme-a, fuuter inffurmeshun, itc.

entry.string: From the menu, you have three choices. "View", "Modify Config", and "Template Tags".
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a three-a chueeces. Um gesh dee bork, bork! "Feeoo", "Mudeeffy Cunffeeg", und "Templete-a Tegs".

entry.string: View -- Allows you to see what themes are currently installed on your system, and the current state that they are in.
entry.translation: Feeoo -- Elloos yuoo tu see-a vhet zeemes ere-a coorrently instelled oon yuoor system, und zee coorrent stete-a thet zeey ere-a in. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Modify Configuration -- Allows you to set certain display configuration values.
entry.translation: Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun -- Elloos yuoo tu set certeeen deespley cunffeegooreshun felooes.

entry.string: Template tags -- Allows you view / edit / delete template tags on the system, as well as add new tags to functions.
entry.translation: Templete-a tegs -- Elloos yuoo feeoo / ideet / delete-a templete-a tegs oon zee system, es vell es edd noo tegs tu fooncshuns.

entry.string: The meta block allows you to configure at one time the meta values for your site. This template can be overridden from your theme directory.
entry.translation: Zee meta bluck elloos yuoo tu cunffeegoore-a et oone-a teeme-a zee meta felooes fur yuoor seete-a. Thees templete-a cun be-a ooferreeddee frum yuoor zeeme-a durectury. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The Themes module has a user menu hook which allows the users of your Xaraya site to change the default theme to their choosing. This can be activated and deactivated from the modules module.
entry.translation: Zee Zeemes mudoole-a hes a user menoo huuk vheech elloos zee users ooff yuoor Xereya seete-a tu chunge-a zee deffoolt zeeme-a tu zeeur chuuseeng. Thees cun be-a ecteefeted und deecteefeted frum zee mudooles mudoole-a.

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
